comment: This is a rectangular block of Chinese characters in an ancient script (likely seal script or similar), arranged in vertical columns from right to left. The text includes both large characters (possibly the main entries) and smaller annotations (likely definitions, phonetic guides, or etymologies). The layout is typical of classical Chinese dictionaries or lexicographical works such as the *Shuowen Jiezi*. The box is bordered by a thick black frame, and there are marginal notes on the left side, including page numbers and possibly author or edition information.
